pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, September 12, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, September 12, 2017:

St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Sheraton Hotel Newfoundland
115 Cavendish Square

Notes for media:

  • On-site coverage of the Cabinet Retreat open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained accreditation in advance, please present yourself to the accreditation desk on site.

Media appearance

  • An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Newfoundland & Labrador’s Here and Now during the supper-hour local newscast.
  • Clips of an interview with the Prime Minister will air on NTV during the supper-hour local newscast. Full interview to air on Sunday September 17, 2017.

Note: All times local
